rt.cameras

Class DummyCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.cameras.DummyCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Camera

    public class DummyCamera
extends java.lang.Object
implements Camera
    A camera whose rays have x- and y- coordinates in the direction vector in the range [0,1] over the image plane. This is usually not useful for rendering. The class is provided for educational purposes and used in the Mandelbrot scene.

      • makeWorldSpaceRay

        public Ray makeWorldSpaceRay(int i,
                             int j,
                             float[] sample)
        Make a ray whose x- and y- coordinates in the direction vector are in the range [0,1] over the image plane.
        Specified by:
        makeWorldSpaceRay in interface Camera
        Parameters:
        i - pixel column index
        j - pixel row index
        sample - random sample that the camera can use to generate a ray
        Returns:
        the ray in world coordinates
